The verification of bond defaults is handled by an admin. params.cdsID: The ID of the CDS to validate the default.

params.nextCouponAmount: Amount of the next coupon payment.

params.cdsID: The ID of the CDS contract to purchase.
The ID of the CDS for which the collateral is being recovered.
The ID of the CDS to reject the default.
The ID of the CDS to verify default.

acceptDefault(uint256).notice: Admin verifies and accepts that the bond has defaulted.

addBond(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Adds a new bond to the system.

buyCDS(uint256).notice: Allows a buyer to purchase a CDS contract.

recoverCollateral(uint256).notice: The CDS creator can recover their collateral if no accusation was made 5 days after the coupon expiration.

rejectDefault(uint256).notice: Admin rejects the claim that the bond has defaulted.

requestDefaultVerification(uint256).notice: Buyer or any other CDS holder requests verification from the admin if a bond has defaulted.
